headline.main: Myanmar Ruling Party Leaders Meet Before Parliamentary Showdown
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Ruling Party Leaders Meet Before Parliamentary Showdown

headline.main: South Sudan's Warring Leaders Go Into Negotiations
headline.print_headline: South Sudan's Warring Leaders Go Into Negotiations

docs.snippet: Leaders from the South Sudan's warring factions are in Ethiopia in a last ditch effort to sign a peace deal ahead of Monday's deadline to end the country's civil war....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leaders from the South Sudan's warring factions are in Ethiopia in a last ditch effort to sign a peace deal ahead of Monday's deadline to end the country's civil war.

headline.main: Trump Says Would Raise Visa Fees to Pay for Mexican Border Wall
headline.print_headline: Trump Says Would Raise Visa Fees to Pay for Mexican Border Wall

docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump would increase fees on some Mexican visas and all border crossing cards as part of a broader plan to force Mexico to pay for a wall along the southern U.S. border....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump would increase fees on some Mexican visas and all border crossing cards as part of a broader plan to force Mexico to pay for a wall along the southern U.S. border.

headline.main: Day Wins PGA Championship in Record Style
headline.print_headline: Day Wins PGA Championship in Record Style

docs.snippet: Australia's Jason Day held his nerve to end five years of close calls at the majors with an emotional breakthrough victory by three shots over American Jordan Spieth at the PGA Championship on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's Jason Day held his nerve to end five years of close calls at the majors with an emotional breakthrough victory by three shots over American Jordan Spieth at the PGA Championship on Sunday.

headline.main: Clinton Emails Should Also Be Reviewed by Inspector General: Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: Clinton Emails Should Also Be Reviewed by Inspector General: Lawmaker

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton's private email server should be examined by the U.S. intelligence watchdog after the FBI finishes reviewing any classified information on it, a Republican lawmaker said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton's private email server should be examined by the U.S. intelligence watchdog after the FBI finishes reviewing any classified information on it, a Republican lawmaker said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: ‘Straight Outta Compton’ Tops Weekend Box Office

docs.snippet: The N.W.A. biopic, backed by a sophisticated marketing campaign, touched a cultural nerve over the weekend, taking in $56.1 million at the domestic box office, an astounding total for an R-rated drama....
docs.abstract: The N.W.A. biopic, backed by a sophisticated marketing campaign, touched a cultural nerve over the weekend, taking in $56.1 million at the domestic box office, an astounding total for an R-rated drama.

headline.main: Indonesian plane crashed into mountain, says official citing locals
headline.sub: Indonesian plane crashed into mountain, says official citing locals

docs.snippet: An aircraft with 54 people on board crashed in Indonesia's remote and mountainous region of Papua, a government official citing local residents says. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: An aircraft with 54 people on board crashed in Indonesia's remote and mountainous region of Papua, a government official citing local residents says. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
